actions.committee: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Civil Service.

official_title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to provide civil service retirement credit to a Federal employee for any period of service performed with the American Red Cross abroad during a period of war.

summary.text: Provides civil service retirement credit to a Federal employee who leaves his or her position to serve with the American Red Cross abroad during a period of war if such employee subsequently returns to Federal employment.

titles.title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to provide civil service retirement credit to a Federal employee for any period of service performed with the American Red Cross abroad during a period of war.
